item.content:encoded:
My key focus is to exceed client expectations! I’ve worked on small and large projects throughout my design career. I have worked for local and global companies so I am experienced with following brand guidelines. I am reliable, creative, and passionate about what I do.

Experienced in designing: complex platforms, web and mobile apps, dashboards, corporate websites, online stores, landings pages; as well as skilled at creating: logos, ads, banners, etc.

item.title: Vicky Kumar
item.dc:creator: Lalit Kumar
item.description:
Eight Years of first hand experience in network and linux administration, support and Core Network design. Excellent knowledge of various tasks such as: routing, BGP, VPN, Layer 3 networking(Routing), Layer 2 networking (LAN switching), VLAN, OSPF, RIP, network and packet troubleshooting. Working experience with various network equipment such as: Cisco, Juniper Networks, Extreme Networks, Redback […]

The post Vicky Kumar appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
item.content:encoded:
• Eight Years of first hand experience in network and linux administration, support and Core Network design. Excellent knowledge of various tasks such as: routing, BGP, VPN, Layer 3 networking(Routing), Layer 2 networking (LAN switching), VLAN, OSPF, RIP, network and packet troubleshooting.
  • Working experience with various network equipment such as: Cisco, Juniper Networks, Extreme Networks, Redback Networks and so on.
  • Knowledge in Linux networking and service management, such as APACHE server, Nginx, LAMP, MYSQL, MongoDB,POSTGRESQL,mariadb, URL rewrite.
  • Design and Implement servers and services platforms on popular Linux distributions (Redhat, CenOS, Ubuntu, etc.) in both on-premise & cloud contexts
  • Experience inÂ  AWS ,Ec2, Elastic Beanstalk, Route 53, Workmail, LightTail, Load Balancer Reserved Instances,s3, RDS, IAM, Snapshot, Instance Migration to other regions,Â 
  • Â Experience in long running applications, load balancing, EBS volumes and IAM role using Amazon EC2 container service (ECS).
  • Experience in monitoring metrics on EC2, EBS, Elastic Load Balancer, RDS USING CloudWatch.
  • Experience in Backup services like EBS snapshots, S3 backups, IAM roles and Multi Factor Authentication.
  • Manage AWS EC2 instances utilizing Auto Scaling, Elastic Load Balancing

AMI,cloudtrail,Auto-Scaling.

  • Maintain, upgrade, and manage servers and related software, hardware, networks, and tools.
  • Ensure security through access control & backups.
  • VPS providers: Linode, Rackspace, Amazon(AWS), MediaTemple, HostGator, Cloudflare, CDN, NameCheap, GoDaddy, DigitalOcean, Bluehost.
  • WHMCS RESELLER setup and migration on project or permanent basis. Including DNS, EMAIL, website migration.
  • CPANEL, PLESK, WEBMIN, H-sphere, SHELL administration
  • Handles the traffic with Load Balancer, Auto-Scaling.
  • Setup/Managing CDN on Amazon CloudFront ( Origin Path: Server / S3) to improve site
  • SSL certificates configuration and installation.
  • Experience in Version control Softwares like Git, Bitbucket
  • Experience using Docker Containers.

 

I am always learning new things and constantly looking for bleeding edge technologies. I always offer my clients the latest and greatest solutions for their infrastructure so they get the most value for less money.

The post Vicky Kumar appeared first on Media Shop Canada.

item.title: Manjit Singh
item.dc:creator: Lalit Kumar
item.description:
I am a Senior Web Applications Engineer with extensive experience in building high quality web applications. In my 8+ years of career I have worked and created diverse web applications including Learning management systems, Memebership portals,Booking portals, Back Ends, Job baard website, Web Portals / eCommerce and a lot more. Following Test Driven Development and […]

The post Manjit Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
item.content:encoded:
I am a Senior Web Applications Engineer with extensive experience in building high quality web applications.

In my 8+ years of career I have worked and created diverse web applications including Learning management systems, Memebership portals,Booking portals, Back Ends, Job baard website, Web Portals / eCommerce and a lot more.

Following Test Driven Development and Object Oriented best practices I strive to deliver well designed and robust solutions to my clients.
I have experience using GIT and Subversion version control systems.

CMS: WHMCS,Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla, Thinkific, Squarespace,shopify, OsCommerce
Pogramming Language: PHP/MYSQL/JAVASCRIPT/HTML/CSS
CRM: Salesforce, ZOHO

I thank you in advance for your consideration and look forward to working with you soon.

The post Manjit Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.

The post Aman Goel appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
item.content:encoded:
I have 5 years of successful experience in web development using PHP, MySQL and different kind of CMS and Frameworks. I’ve developed many cutom websites of different complexity and areas such as business portals, e-commerce products, news portals, etc.

Despite I prefer backend development, I’m always flexible to provide you a turn-key and high quality solution within agreed scope, terms and budget.

I’m honest, reliable and always complete my job until successful delivery and provide a post-delivery maintenance if necessary.

Contact me to resolve your problem, I’ll do my best to help you.
Looking forward for a long-term cooperation.

item.title: Abhijeet Singh

item.content:encoded:
I am a full time expert Web-Designer/Developer. I can perform both front-end and back-end responsibilities. I have developed and maintained websites using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (jQuery), PHP, MYSQL. I do have experience with many CMS like WordPress,Thinkific,Squparespace,Shopify etc I can completely handle designing/developing complete dynamic websites from design to deployment.

I always work with my clients with a motive to work on long term basis and provide excellent after sales service. I am proactive when it comes to work and believe in over-delivering for my clients. I will give you long term service and maintain a healthy, fruitful work relationship with you.

item.title: Angrej Singh
item.dc:creator: Lalit Kumar
item.description:
Lorem IpsumÂ is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

The post Angrej Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
item.content:encoded:
I’m a UX/UI designer with web & graphic design background. I’m passionate about merging interaction design, information architecture and graphic design into one usable product/applications.

Professional in Graphics Design (print and web), ui/ux design and front end development with 6+ years’ experience in Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign and Adobe XD and 8+ years’ experience in HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery.

Having an interest in a wide range of projects of graphics for print and web including flyers, brochures, infographics, stand up banners, marketing and branding materials, presentations, invest decks, books, web and print banners, UI/UX design for websites/apps and coding using HTML5, CSS and Bootstrap techniques, etc.

Able to work within boundaries of deadlines and changing priorities and to effectively communicate with clients to ensure they are on track with deadlines and other goals.

Main goals are to receive the best feedback for what I do, and to do it in the best way. Building a long-term relationship with my clients is another important target for me.

My tools:
â€¢Sketch,
â€¢Adobe Illustrator,
â€¢Adobe Photoshop,
â€¢Adobe XD,
â€¢Adobe After Effects
â€¢InVision Studio,
â€¢InVision Inspect,
â€¢Zeplin

The post Angrej Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
